channel.title: CVE Feed for ctrlo -- lenio
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ctrlo -- lenio

item.title: CVE-2021-4253|2024-08-03T17:23:09.084Z -- ctrlo -- lenio
item.description: A vulnerability, which was classified as problematic, was found in ctrlo lenio. Affected is an unknown function in the library lib/Lenio.pm of the component Ticket Handler. The manipulation of the argument site_id leads to cross site scripting. It is possible to launch the attack remotely. The name of the patch is 7a1f90bd2a0ce95b8338ec0926902da975ec64d9. It is recommended to apply a patch to fix this issue. VDB-216210 is the identifier assigned to this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2021-4255|2024-08-03T17:23:10.603Z -- ctrlo -- lenio
item.description: A vulnerability was found in ctrlo lenio and classified as problematic. Affected by this issue is some unknown functionality of the file views/contractor.tt. The manipulation of the argument contractor.name leads to cross site scripting. The attack may be launched remotely. The name of the patch is e1646d5cd0a2fbab9eb505196dd2ca1c9e4cdd97. It is recommended to apply a patch to fix this issue. The identifier of this vulnerability is VDB-216212.

item.title: CVE-2021-4254|2024-08-03T17:23:09.119Z -- ctrlo -- lenio
item.description: A vulnerability has been found in ctrlo lenio and classified as problematic. Affected by this vulnerability is an unknown functionality of the file views/layouts/main.tt of the component Notice Handler. The manipulation of the argument notice.notice.text leads to cross site scripting. The attack can be launched remotely. The name of the patch is aa300555343c1c081951fcb68bfb6852fbba7451. It is recommended to apply a patch to fix this issue. The associated identifier of this vulnerability is VDB-216211.

item.title: CVE-2021-4256|2024-08-03T17:23:09.128Z -- ctrlo -- lenio
item.description: A vulnerability was found in ctrlo lenio. It has been classified as problematic. This affects an unknown part of the file views/index.tt. The manipulation of the argument task.name/task.site.org.name leads to cross site scripting. It is possible to initiate the attack remotely. The name of the patch is e1646d5cd0a2fbab9eb505196dd2ca1c9e4cdd97. It is recommended to apply a patch to fix this issue. The identifier VDB-216213 was assigned to this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2021-4257|2024-08-03T17:23:10.547Z -- ctrlo -- lenio
item.description: A vulnerability was found in ctrlo lenio. It has been declared as problematic. This vulnerability affects unknown code of the file views/task.tt of the component Task Handler. The manipulation of the argument site.org.name/check.name/task.tasktype.name/task.name leads to cross site scripting. The attack can be initiated remotely. The name of the patch is 698c5fa465169d6f23c6a41ca4b1fc9a7869013a. It is recommended to apply a patch to fix this issue. VDB-216214 is the identifier assigned to this vulnerability.
